3.110 
Liability of the spouses for obligations arising before the registration of the marriage 
1. The joint property of the spouses may not be used to satisfy any obligations of the spouses which arose before the registration of the marriage, except in the case of recovery of the spouse's share of the joint property. 
2. The claims of creditors common to both spouses shall be satisfied out of the common property before the claims of the creditors of each spouse. This rule does not apply to creditors of pledges/mortgages.
